scripts.gen_ca_crt: cd ./TLS & openssl genrsa -out ./keys/ca.key 1024 & openssl req -new -key ./keys/ca.key -out ./keys/ca.csr & openssl x509 -req -in ./keys/ca.csr -signkey ./keys/ca.key -out ./keys/ca.crt
scripts.gen_server_rsa: cd ./TLS & openssl genrsa -out ./keys/server.key 1024 & openssl req -new -key ./keys/server.key -out ./keys/server.csr & openssl rsa -in ./keys/server.key -pubout -out ./keys/server.pem & openssl x509 -req -CA ./keys/ca.crt -CAkey ./keys/ca.key -CAcreateserial -in ./keys/server.csr -out ./keys/server.crt
scripts.gen_client_rsa: cd ./TLS & openssl genrsa -out ./keys/client.key 1024 & openssl req -new -key ./keys/client.key -out ./keys/client.csr & openssl rsa -in ./keys/client.key -pubout -out ./keys/client.pem & openssl x509 -req -CA ./keys/ca.crt -CAkey ./keys/ca.key -CAcreateserial -in ./keys/client.csr -out ./keys/client.crt
